sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Jacques Delors, former president of the European Commission, has died at the age of 98.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Delors laid the foundations for the modern European Union by creating the single market that made the free movement of people, capital, goods and services possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He also headed the so-called Delors Committee, which proposed the creation of the euro. Delors served as France's Minister of Finance from 1981 to 1984. He declined to run in the 1995 French presidential election, which was eventually won by Jacques Chirac. Born in Paris in 1925 into a humble family, Jacques Delors began his career as a member

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: of the Banque de France in 1945 after studying economics at the Sorbonne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Involved in politics and trade unionism from an early age, he joined the French Confederation of Christian Workers or CFTC in 1944. At the age of 54, Delors was elected a member of the European Parliament in 1979.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He chaired the Economic and Monetary Affairs Committee of the European Assembly until 1981 when he was appointed Minister of the Economy, Finance and Budget in Pierre Mouroy's government where he participated in the European integration of French economic policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Two years later, he was elected mayor of Clichy and invested himself in the life of this Parisian suburb.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But in 1985, he became president of the European Commission, a position he held for a decade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: During that time, the single market became a reality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: His achievements include the launch of the European and Economic Monetary Union that led to the Euro, the European Social Dialogue, the enlargements of the bloc and the Erasmus Programme.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This economic and monetary union became the central plank of the Maastricht Treaty, the biggest change since the bloc began. The treaty on which Delors worked hard entered into force on 1 November 1993, two years before the end of his term in office. He then tried to return to French politics, but finally withdrew his candidacy for the 1995 elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He lacked sufficient support and did not want to interfere with his daughter's career, French socialist politician Martine Aubry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: After the death of his wife in 2020, Delors relied on his daughter, with whom he was close.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Protect, strengthen, anticipate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Those are the watchwords of the 13th Belgian presidency of the Council of the E.U., which begins on January 1.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The country will take the lead in joint discussions during what promises to be a turbulent political period, with the European elections at the beginning of June in its sights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In practice, the Belgian presidency will not have the usual full six months to complete the 150 dossiers on the table. For the prime minister, the first priority is to protect citizens and turn the EU towards the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: FRANCOIS BOULEAU, Prime Minister of the Netherlands FRANCOIS BOULEAU, Prime Minister of the Netherlands FRANCOIS BOULEAU, Prime Minister of the Netherlands economy, economy that creates our prosperity, that creates employment, that finances our social solidarity, to help this economy make the transition to a sustainable economy, an industry that helps us achieve the objectives of the Green Deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: When it comes to the EU's Green Deal, the Belgian presidency will have to reach an agreement on carbon emissions from trucks and buses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: residency will have to reach an agreement on carbon emissions from trucks and buses. It will also have the task of reaching an inter-institutional compromise on packaging, which aims to reduce, reuse and recycle these products.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Finally, Belgium will oversee the first discussions on the bloc's environmental targets for 2040.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A Belgian-style compromise will also be required to reach agreement on the revision of the union's multi-annual budget.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last week, the E.U.'s 27 leaders were unable to agree on a budget increase requested by the European Commission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Finally, reform of the E.U. and the possible enlargement of it will be discussed during this six-month period.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The signals being sent out by the Belgian authorities on enlargement will be closely followed by the 27 EU member states as they celebrate the 20th anniversary of the Union's great eastward enlargement in the first half of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The diamond sector in Antwerp is preparing to apply the newly agreed sanctions against Russian diamonds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: After months of deliberation, the new measures agreed between the G7 and EU countries will start working progressively from January 1.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The first to be hit will be rough diamonds, of which Russia is the largest exporter globally, with 30% of the total production by volume.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But tracking diamonds isn't easy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This will be a blockchain system where the transformation of a diamond is fully recorded and that you can track basically what is going on with the diamonds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Every diamond that will be sold in countries that impose the sanctions will have to travel first to Antwerp in Belgium to be certified.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Through this system, the Belgian city will not be as hard hit by the sanctions aimed at punishing Russia. So Antwerp has been always the most important trading hub for diamonds. Yes, we were losing that with the current system in place, which I think is a really good system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Yeah, yeah, the flows will come back to the European Union and you'll have an impact.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Having both the G7 and EU on board was key to ensuring that the system would actually hit Russia and the diamonds will not be sold elsewhere, both by around 70% of diamonds globally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In 2021, Russia exported $400 billion worth of diamonds, most of them by a single company, Arosa.
